Issue.description: As a Win64 user I need to have an MSI based installer for the sovrin node and all dependencies like 3d party python modules and orientdb.Research and choose right approach.PoA:* We can create a msi file of the sovrin node package pretty simple: https://docs.python.org/3/distutils/apiref.html#module-distutils.command.bdist_msiIn this case we have to create msi for each dependency because bundling is not supported.* As alternative, we can use tool like this https://www.firegiant.com/wix/tutorial/. The tool is not simple as python setup.py bdist_msi it may take time to learn how to work with it.
